text.div:
Part Of Day

The period of time in which a day is commonly divided.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    73775008morning
    422133006afternoon
    3157002evening
    2546009night
